code_posts.title: Life After Graduation
code_posts.description: Six weeks after finishing a web development  bootcamp at Bitmaker and I still can't find a job.

code_posts.title: Symposium
code_posts.description: As new grads, Bimaker sets up an event for us to showcase our final projects. This is our chance to wow employers and compete for jobs.

code_posts.title: Presentation Day
code_posts.description: It's the final day of course. After working for weeks on our final apps, today we present them to the class.

code_posts.title: Final Projects
code_posts.description: The course requires a final project. By this point we're nearing completion. I write about the stressful process and troubles within my group.

code_posts.title: Last Week Blues
code_posts.description: We've chose our final project and the work is coming along. I give a short update on how I'm managing the heavy workload.

code_posts.title: Group Project Land
code_posts.description: All solo projects are finished. Love it or hate it, from now on it's all about group work.

code_posts.title: JavaScript is Hard
code_posts.description: The challenges of moving beyond beginner concepts in JavaScript, and feeling the pressure of competitiveness.

code_posts.title: Into Week 6
code_posts.description: All about long hours, lots of code, and rundowns of the technologies we're working with.

code_posts.title: Right in the Middle
code_posts.description: I'm writing about the bootcamp experience. I hope it helps give others an idea of what it's like.
